description: The X2 is an introductory touring boot with warmth and stability for all-around use. The boot's tall cuff and zip-up lace cover seal out snow, while a Thinsulate™ lining wraps your foot for warmth. The touring-specific sole and lateral heel support provide stability for all-around trail skiing.<br><br>Ski Control, Walkability<br>The Sport Sole features Tech Grip for comfortable walking and central insert cleats for maximum precision and control on the ski<br><br>Extra Warmth<br>3M Thinsulate™ heat-retaining insulation delivers increased warmth in damp and cold conditions for all-day comfort and warmth<br><br>Women's Fit<br>Our FW Fit offers reduced instep volume and narrower fit from midfoot through heel for increased comfort and precision<br><br>Customizable Fit, Comfort<br>Thermoadjustable liners can be heat-molded around your feet for a customized fit and comfort
name: XC 2 FW
